previewShowIdEnabled.description: Set it to true to show the CSS ID that is assigned to each sectional headings as well as to figures, tables, and listings.

previewShowLabelEnabled.description: Set it to true to show a label that is assigned to each sectional headings as well as to figures, tables, and listings.

previewImageEnabled.description: Set to true to show images inside the PREVIEW. Set to false to not show images inside the PREVIEW. Default is true.

latexTitle.description: Specify a string that would be used for document title.

latexAuthor.description: Specify a string that would be used for document author.

latexIsArticle.description: Set to true to typeset it as an article rather than a report/book. Default is set to true.

latexDocumentClass.description: Specify the document class that is for LATEX translation, such as *report*. The default is empty, in which case *article* is chosen for non-book generation and *book* is chosen for book generation.

latexTwoColumnEnabled.description: Set it to true if *twocolumn* is going to be specified as part of the option to the LATEX *documentclass* command.

latexTwoSideEnabled.description: Set it to true if *twoside* is going to be specified as part of the option to *geometry* package.

latexA4PaperEnabled.description: Set it to true if *a4paper* is going to be specified as part of the option to *geometry* package.

latexTableStyle.description: Specify a style for all longtables.

latexAutoRubyEnabled.description: Set it to true to allow rubification of Japanese text in a sample blocks.

latexDescriptionItemBullet.description: Set to a Unicode code point string such as *0xA7* that denotes a special character to be placed in front of each item in a description block.

latexStepMargin.description: Left margin increment (in centimeters) for each indentation. Must be set between 0 and 8.5. Default is 0.85

latexSampleMargin.description: Left margin for each sample block. Must be set between 0 and 8.5. Default is 0.85

latexSampleSize.description: The font size for each sample block. Must be *normalsize*, *small*, *footnotesize*, *scriptsize*, or *tiny*.

latexTabularFontsize.description: The font size for each sample block. Must be *normalsize*, *small*, *footnotesize*, *scriptsize*, or *tiny*.

latexLongtableFontsize.description: The font size for each sample block. Must be *normalsize*, *small*, *footnotesize*, *scriptsize*, or *tiny*.

latexSampleWrap.description: Set it to an integer for which lines longer than this will be wrapped. Set it to 0 will turn the feature off.

latexLeftMargin.description: Set it to a positive number expressing the left margin in centimeters.

latexRightMargin.description: Set it to a positive number expressing the right margin in centimeters.

latexTopMargin.description: Set it to a positive number expressing the top margin in centimeters.

latexLeftMarginForTwoColumn.description: Set it to a positive number expressing the left margin in centimeters.

latexRightMarginForTwoColumn.description: Set it to a positive number expressing the right margin in centimeters.

latexTopMarginForTwoColumn.description: Set it to a positive number expressing the top margin in centimeters.
